alert.note: Alert for Arkansas; Desha (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 06 at 4:30PM CDT until September 06 at 5:15PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Desha County in southeastern Arkansas... Southern Arkansas County in southeastern Arkansas... * Until 515 PM CDT. * At 430 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Kelso, or 7 miles northeast of Rohwer, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Dumas... Rohwer... Arkansas City... Watson... Lucca Landing... Yancopin... Jersey Point... Kelso... Morgan Point Recreation Area... Pickens in Desha County... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
